description: A surprisingly compact 50-round helical magazine for use with the Calico M960 SMG.
A surprisingly compact 100-round helical magazine for use with the Calico M960 SMG.
An extended 30-round polymer magazine for use with Glock compatible firearms.
A compact, light-weight polymer magazine for use with Glock compatible firearms.
Made for the Glock 17, this magazine holds 17 rounds.
Made for the Glock 17, this magazine holds 22 rounds.
Made to fit most Glock pistols.  This drum magazine holds 50 rounds.
Made to fit most Glock pistols.  This double drum magazine holds 100 rounds.
A 35-round extended magazine compatible with both the M9 handgun and some modern carbines.
A 32-round extended magazine compatible with both the M9 handgun and some modern carbines.
A 30-round extended magazine compatible with both the M9 handgun and some modern carbines.
An extended-capacity 20-round box magazine for use with the Beretta M9 handgun.
An 18-round box magazine for use with the Beretta M9 handgun.
A 17-round box magazine for use with the Beretta M9 handgun.
A military issue 15-round box magazine originally intended for use with the Beretta M9 handgun.

A 10-round box magazine for use with the Beretta M9 handgun, physically of the same size as a 15-round magazine.  It's made to comply with laws that limit maximum magazine capacity for firearms in some states.
A bulky 100-round double drum magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
A drum magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.  Much greater capacity, but less reliable than the factory specification magazine.
An extended-capacity 40-round magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
An extended-capacity 38-round magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
A standard capacity curved magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
A compact 20-round magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
A compact 15-round magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
A compact 10-round magazine for use with the H&K MP5 SMG.
A standard-capacity angled-feed 8-round steel box magazine for use with the Luger pistol.
An unreliable and bulky 32-round snail-drum magazine, originally designed for use with the Luger pistol.
A tiny piece of grooved metal designed to allow a shooter to quickly load ten rounds of 9x19mm into a compatible firearm.
A 10-round box magazine for Mauser pistols, specifically variants made to use a detachable magazine.
A 20-round box magazine for Mauser pistols, specifically variants made to use a detachable magazine.
A double-column, single-feed 32-round box magazine used by the MP 40 SMG.

A 10-round box magazine for use with the Beretta Px4 9x19mm handgun, physically of the same size as 15-round and 17-round magazines.  It's made to comply with laws that limit maximum magazine capacity for firearms in some states.
A 15-round box magazine for use with the Beretta Px4 9x19mm handgun.
A standard magazine for the Beretta Px4 9x19mm.
An extended-capacity 20-round box magazine for use with the Beretta Px4 9x19mm handgun.
A double-column, single-feed 9x19mm magazine used by the STEN submachine gun, based off the magazines for the German MP 28 and later MP 40.
An improvised magazine that is mostly compatible with the STEN submachine gun, with a simplified feed system.
A compact 10-round magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG.
A compact 20-round magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG.
A 30-round steel box magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG, made as a more reliable alternative to 32-round magazines.
A cheap and somewhat unreliable 32-round steel box magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG.
An extended 36-round steel box magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG.
An extended 50-round steel box magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG.
A bulky 72-round steel drum magazine for use with the TEC-9 SMG.

A 10-round box magazine for use with the H&K USP 9x19mm pistol, physically of the same size as a 15-round magazine.  It's made to comply with laws that limit maximum magazine capacity for firearms in some states.
A factory specification 15-round box magazine for use with the dependable H&K USP 9x19mm pistol.
An extended 18-round box magazine for use with the H&K USP 9x19mm pistol.
An extended 20-round box magazine for use with the H&K USP 9x19mm pistol.
An extended 32-round box magazine for use with the H&K USP 9x19mm pistol.
A compact 20-round box magazine for use with the Uzi SMG.
A compact 25-round box magazine for use with the Uzi SMG.
A standard 32-round steel box magazine for use with the Uzi SMG.
An extended-capacity 40-round box magazine for use with the Uzi SMG.
An extended-capacity 50-round box magazine for use with the Uzi SMG.
A bulky 100-round double drum magazine for use with the Uzi SMG.
A standard 7-round steel box magazine for the Kel-Tec PF-9.
A standard steel box magazine with magazine extension installed, for use with the Kel-Tec PF-9.  Holds a total of 8 rounds and provides a better grip for the shooter when loaded.
A 10-round double stack box magazine for the SIG Sauer P226.
A 15-round double stack box magazine for the SIG Sauer P226.
A 13-round double stack box magazine for the SIG Sauer P228 (also known as the M11) or P229.
A 10-round magazine for use with the United States army’s general issue 9x19mm handguns.

variants.description: A 10-round box magazine for the SIG Sauer P320.  Also compatible with its derivative pistols, the M17 and M18.

description: A 17-round magazine for use with the United States army’s general issue 9x19mm handguns.

variants.description: A 17-round double stack box magazine for the SIG Sauer P320.  Also compatible with its derivative pistols, the M17 and M18.

description: A 21-round magazine for use with the United States army’s general issue 9x19mm handguns.

variants.description: A 21-round double stack box magazine for the SIG Sauer P320.  Also compatible with its derivative pistols, the M17 and M18.

description: A 10-round box magazine for the SIG Sauer SP2022, 2340, and 2009.
A 12-round box magazine for the SIG Sauer SP2022, 2340, and 2009.
A 15-round box magazine for the SIG Sauer SP2022, 2340, and 2009.
A 13-round steel box magazine for the Browning Hi-Power 9x19mm.
A 15-round steel box magazine for the Browning Hi-Power 9x19mm.
An 8-round steel box magazine for the Walther P38.
A 10-round steel box magazine for the Walther PPQ 9x19mm.
A 15-round steel box magazine for the Walther PPQ 9x19mm.
A 17-round steel box magazine for the Walther PPQ 9x19mm.
An 8-round steel box magazine for use with the Hi-Point C-9.
A 10-round steel box magazine for use with the Hi-Point C-9.
A 15-round steel box magazine for use with the Hi-Point C-9.
A 12-round steel box magazine for use with the CZ 75.
A 20-round steel box magazine for use with the CZ 75.
A 26-round steel box magazine for use with the CZ 75.
An 8-round steel box magazine for use with the Walther CCP.
A standard steel box magazine with magazine extension installed, for use with the Walther CCP.  Holds a total of 9 rounds and provides a better grip for the shooter when loaded.
A 10-round translucent polymer magazine for use with the Brügger & Thomet MP9 and compatible guns.
A 15-round translucent polymer magazine for use with the Brügger & Thomet MP9 and compatible guns.
A 20-round translucent polymer magazine for use with the Brügger & Thomet MP9 and compatible guns.

//: For some reason, the 15 and 20 round magazines are more expensive (CHF 41.50) than the 25 and 30 round variants (CHF 38). What the U.S. Army pays for them, only they know.
description: A 25-round translucent polymer magazine for use with the Brügger & Thomet MP9 and compatible guns.
A 30-round translucent polymer magazine for use with the Brügger & Thomet MP9 and compatible guns.
A bulky 50-round aluminum drum magazine for use with the Brügger & Thomet MP9 and compatible guns.
